project_description: A simple web-based application that allows users to manage daily tasks by adding, updating, marking as completed, and deleting tasks.
objectives: Create a simple web-based To-Do List app
Enable users to add, update, and delete tasks
scope: Display all tasks in a list
key_features: Add a task with a title and optional description
Display all tasks in a list
technical_requirements: The app should load within 3 seconds
The app should work on desktop and mobile browsers
assumptions: Users do not require accounts or login functionality
No notifications or reminders are needed
